bibdata.title: IEEE Standard for Three-Phase, Manually Operated Subsurface Load Interrupting Switches for Alternating-Current Systems
IEEE Standard for Three-Phase, Manually Operated Subsurface Load Interrupting Switches for Alternating-Current Systems

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: This standard applies to three-phase group-operated 60-Hz subsurface load-interrupting switches with maximum ratings of 600 A and 38 kV that utilize separable insulated connectors. It covers service conditions; ratings and test requirements; design, production, and conformance tests; construction requirements; and shipping requirements.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
